DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy safety GW685698X 100mcg daily ( QD ) aqueous nasal spray vehicle placebo nasal spray adult adolescent subject ( 12 year age old ) perennial allergic rhinitis ( PAR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Once-Daily Investigational Nasal Spray In Adults And Adolescents With Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel-Group , Multicenter Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Once-Daily Intranasal Administration GW685698X Aqueous Nasal Spray 100mcg 6 Weeks Adult Adolescent Subjects 12 year Age Older Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis perennial allergic rhinitis ( PAR ) . Must comply study procedure literate . Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid . Use allergy identify medication study . Current tobacco use tobacco use within past year . Exposure investigational study drug within past 12 month . Clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) laboratory abnormality .
